isis.stitle: MOR/RYDE RUBBER SPRING SUSPENSION - MAINTENANCE - SHOCK ABSORBER

svcproc.title: SHOCK ABSORBER
svcproc.para: The shock absorbers used on the MOR/RYDE Rubber Suspension are of the sealed, hydraulic type and require no periodic maintenance. Shock absorbers of this type should be checked every 10,000 miles (16,000 km) to make sure they are functioning satisfactorily, bushings are not worn, and the dust cover has not been damaged by flying stones or debris from the road. If a shock absorber is leaking, fails to operate, or develops an unusual noise, the complete unit should be replaced. Refer to SHOCK ABSORBER.
